long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save the tabs you are using and you are going to use later easily with just one button !


Imagine when you are watching a series or movie and you closed the tab before you are finished it. What are you gonna do, are you going to search all of your chrome history to find the tab ?
No, you dont need to do it anymore, just use this extension, save the tab and give it a cool name!

Or you saw a important page you want to use it later. Just save it with this extension, give it a name and go it later. 


## Url Name 
Set a name for current tab, you can always click the name of any tab to go link whenever you want.

## Save (Button)
It will save the tab with "url name".

## Update (Button)
It changes the link of tab with your current tab's link. (If you are watching a movie or series you can use it just before you are gonna close the page)

## Pencil (Button)
Just changes the "url name".

## Trash (Button)
Removes the tab.
